item.title: FT Most Read: Thursday, December 26, 2024 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. De Beers amasses biggest diamond stockpile since 2008 financial crisis
2. Chess champion Magnus Carlsen leads gambit to capture ancient game
3. China steps up campaign for single people to date, marry and give birth
4. Russia launches Christmas Day attack on Ukraineâ€™s energy system
5. Fine wine market in the red as Chinese demand dries up
item.guid: FT Most Read: Thursday, December 26, 2024 at 8:20 AM UTC
